Title: Sysctls applied to containers with host IPC or host network namespaces can affect the host
Description: Before setting the sysctls for a pod, the pods namespaces must be unshared (created).
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 1.18.0 before 1.19.5, all versions starting from 1.20.0 before 1.20.6, all versions starting from 1.21.0 before 1.21.5, all versions starting from 1.22.0 before 1.22.2, all versions starting from 1.23.0 before 1.23.1
